Articles.Content: I got MechJeb v1.8.1 and ksp 0.15 but i noticed not all vab mods works now in special the mod from MechJeb don\'t like some mods any solution please?
You need to wait for them to be updated to be compatable with .15

Latest MechJeb is 1.8.2. Try that.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Sorry made a mistake my is v1.8.2 with is for ksp 0.15 and have problems some mods don\'t like to be conected

Is this a fresh install? What are these mods you are referring to? Exactly what isn\'t connecting?

MechJeb is a plugin with a few parts. If other mods are having issues, you need to wait for the authors or those mods to update them. 

You\'re really not giving us much information to determine what might be the problem.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

The MechJeb version 2 pod\'s parts don\'t like to connect manually, so I\'m guessing that\'s the complaint. There\'s a post near the end of the MechJeb thread that has a .craft file attached; that\'s the assembled pod.

Well i deleted all again and had a fresh install and same for mechjeb I\'m adding mods very slowly to make sure they are compateble and so far is all working,maybe i had all mods with don\'t like mechjeb but thanx for all the efort guys thank you.
wher can i down load mechjeb 1.8.2 plz

> 
> wher can i down load mechjeb 1.8.2 plz

The same place you can find all plugin mods, the [Plugin-Powered Addon Releases](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=40.0) board

FYI: The current MJ version is 1.8.3.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

[http://lmgtfy.com/?q=mechjeb](http://lmgtfy.com/?q=mechjeb)

Also, you should rotate the parts in the correct direction first, otherwise they won\'t connect anymore...

PLEASE HELP i was using landing autopilot landed on a mountain, went back to vab, added one more fuel engine, get back? to new mission Cant see landing autopilot even when it shows that i should see it PLEASE help! >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> PLEASE HELP i was using landing autopilot landed on a mountain, went back to vab, added one more fuel engine, get back? to new mission Cant see landing autopilot even when it shows that i should see it PLEASE help! >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

The window might have gotten hidden behind one of the other windows, although sometimes for whatever reason the window position will get thrown way off the screen. If you edit the mechjeb.cfg file in the plugins directory, one of the lines is 'windowPos\_MechJebModuleLandingAutopilot' if one of those numbers following it is really high like 2000+ then make it smaller and it should reappear on your screen.
